Texto: 
mixed solid/cystic lesion in the mesial right temporal lobe with avid enhancement and without significant surrounding edema.
gangliocytoma
• juvenile pilocytic astrocytoma
• dysembryoplastic neuroepithelial tumor (dnet)
• pleomorphic xanthroastrocyoma
• ganglioglioma
13 y.o. boy with seizures.
